#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	short a[5][54]=
	{{0,0,1,0,2,2,0,2,3,0,3,3,0,1,1,0,2,1}
,{0,0,1,0,2,4,0,7,7,0,12,13,0,16,16,0,13,18,0,12,11,0,6,4,0,1}
,{0,0,0,0,4,8,0,20,19,0,31,52,0,67,77,0,93,101,0,116,95,0,92,91,0,63,51,0,29,30,0,16,5,0,0,1}
,{0,0,0,0,4,12,0,28,45,0,95,143,0,236,272,0,411,479,0,630,664,0,742,757,0,741,706,0,580,528,0,379,341,0,205,166,0,84,62,0,34,13,0,4,2}
,{0,0,0,0,2,14,0,58,76,0,204,389,0,660,852,0,1448,1971,0,2832,3101,0,4064,4651,0,5393,5376,0,5570,5785,0,5287,4796,0,3975,3671,0,2687,2080,0,1405,1135,0,630,405,0,178,140,0,51,16,0,3,1}
};
int x,y;
	int zu;
	cin>>zu;
	while(zu--)
	{
		cin>>x>>y;
		if(y>=9*x)cout<<0<<endl;
else cout<<a[x-2][y]<<endl;
	}
}
